segments.text: Hi , Boss ! I'd like to tell you what we've discussed during the day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's going very well , actually . We had a long meeting with them . After several lengthy discussions they decided to accept our offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? That's great . You really did a good job . Anything else to tell me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're meeting with their finance director today and then with the other directors tomorrow , just to sort out some final details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . If he wants to make any changes , minor alternations can be accepted . Let me know what happens .
segments.speaker: S2
